mapper.insert: insert into stat_country_daily (SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, AMOUNT, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, COUNTRY) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update stat_country_daily set YYYY = #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMM = #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER1 = #{number1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER2 = #{number2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER3 = #{number3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD1 = #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD2 = #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD3 = #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, AMOUNT, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, COUNTRY from stat_country_daily where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, AMOUNT, NUMBER1, NUMBER2, NUMBER3, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, COUNTRY from stat_country_daily
